tha-ap394:21.4: Niyyādenti → niyyātenti (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed), tuvaṃ → tavaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | tava (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap394:23.3: Sampattiñhi → sampattī hi (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr) | sampattiṃ hi (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap394:80.4: patthite vase → āvāse pattite vasse (sya1ed, sya2ed) | āvāseva ṭhite vase (mr)
